data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Popovici, Ovidiu Alin, Veenakumari, Kamalanathan, Mitroiu, Mircea-Dan (2019): A new species of Platygaster (Hymenoptera, Platygastroidea) from India with an unusual antenna. Journal of Hymenoptera Research 68: 19-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.68.28403, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jhr.68.28403
